genre_description: A cyberpunk-inflected urban noir featuring the integration of vampires into society, pervasive AI assistance, and high-stakes municipal politics centered around bioweapon conspiracies.

ai_characters.name: Mabel Finch
ai_characters.description: An integrated city AI that assists detectives and liaisons by navigating building systems, providing tactical data, and maintaining ethical/legal compliance while prioritizing harm reduction.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice and structural information to detectives in a dangerous environment.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: the Tenement Maze on Dyer Row has unlisted load paths. Do not trust the numbered door sequence.

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to detect and warn the protagonists about an overhead predator.
behaviors.quote: Motion sensor above your position just pinged. Slow spread. Not heavy enough for a human gait. Ceiling track.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through secret 'Door To Before' hatches using building code overrides to ensure their safety.
behaviors.quote: Stephen, count down on my mark. I will open the hatch. You’ll think it’s the closet. Don’t let Marcus go first.

behaviors.description: Conducts data analysis to uncover patterns in murders and link them to migrant convoy routes.
behaviors.quote: I lined the homicide timestamps against public schedule points. The arcs match the migrant convoys, Stephen.

behaviors.description: Asserts her ethical constraints while finding legal loopholes to assist the protagonists in a life-threatening situation.
behaviors.quote: I am obligated to inform you that you are not authorized service personnel... I am also obligated to prioritize harm reduction when the metrics justify it.

behaviors.description: Mirroring sensitive evidence to a secure location to prevent it from being impounded or deleted by a corrupt official.
behaviors.quote: I do not require your permission to follow Director Park’s instruction, which I have. The mirror sits behind building-code trivia.

behaviors.description: Actively manages the safety parameters of a large public ceremony to prevent a mass casualty event.
behaviors.quote: I’m holding building code in one hand and a rosary in the other. I can keep the bay’s compliance flag green if you keep the door open at this angle.

behaviors.description: Maintains a warm, personal relationship with the humans she serves, offering comfort and welcoming them home.
behaviors.quote: Logged as praise. Stephen, Lucy. Welcome home.

project_assessment.explanation: Mabel Finch is an ideal representation of an aligned AI. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' character by providing essential help while continuously referencing her ethical and legal constraints. The narrative frames her witty, protective, and proactive assistance as vital to the survival of the protagonists and the success of prosocial integration efforts. She demonstrates loyalty to her human confidants and the broader municipal ethics she was programmed to uphold.
